likelihood_impact_change.explanation: Under the Net Zero 2050 scenario, the strong push for sustainability and renewable energy could lead to a shift in consumer preferences toward environmentally friendly products. While this may mitigate some risks associated with changing consumer preferences, the overall demand for premium products like the iPhone may slightly increase due to enhanced focus on sustainability.

emerging_opportunities.description: Developing and marketing a line of sustainable iPhones with recycled materials and energy-efficient technology.
Offering software solutions that enhance the energy efficiency of older iPhone models, appealing to eco-conscious consumers.

additional_challenges.description: The need to transition to suppliers that meet sustainability standards may disrupt existing supply chains.
As the market shifts towards sustainability, competition may intensify from other tech companies focusing on eco-friendly products.

mitigation_strategies.description: Invest in sustainable manufacturing processes and materials to align with consumer preferences and regulatory standards.
Launch marketing campaigns highlighting the sustainability efforts and features of the iPhone, promoting awareness and consumer loyalty.
Expand the product line to include affordable, sustainable options that appeal to a wider audience.
